title: GMFB: Ric Flair vs. The World
itunes:title: GMFB: Ric Flair vs. The World
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: The team talks their new podcast location (:15) and the reaction to their romper segment last week (4:35); Kay discusses running the Chicago Half Marathon (9:58); Audio of Ric Flair and Conor Daly’s appearance on GMFB (13:02) and the group reactions (28:30); The hosts share their favorite trash talkers across sports (34:00); Nate tells a story about Brian Urlacher and the two sides of trash talking in the league (35:17); and finally, the group chats about how leadership can help shape a dynasty (40:47)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
